'''''The Bleak Midwinter''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to get any party member knocked out from [[Sheer Cold]].

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name {{lang|"how cold the bleak midwinter"|zh=多冷的隆冬|zh_rm=Duōlěng de Lóngdōng (phonetic mimicking of "tunak tunak tun")}} is a reference to the Chinese internet meme of the song ''{{w|Tunak Tunak Tun}}'' by {{w|Daler Mehndi}}.
* The expression "The bleak midwinter" itself comes from the poem "{{w|In the Bleak Midwinter}}" by Christina Rossetti.
